item.description: Kubeflow pipelines # Overview of the Kubeflow pipelines service # Kubeflow is a machine learning (ML) toolkit that is dedicated to making deployments of ML workflows on Kubernetes simple, portable, and scalable. Kubeflow pipelines are reusable end-to-end ML workflows built using the Kubeflow Pipelines SDK. The Kubeflow pipelines service has the following goals: End to end orchestration: enabling and simplifying the orchestration of end to end machine learning pipelines Easy experimentation: making it easy for you to try numerous ideas and techniques, and manage your various trials/experiments.
